description: Request criteria for searching artifact metadata, sorting the results, and limiting the number of results returned.

sortString.description: The field should come first, and all flags/types should come afterwards in a comma separated list.  Example: myVersion, VERSION, DESC

$eref.description: The field should come first, and all flags/types should come afterwards in a comma separated list.  Example: myVersion, VERSION, DESC

oneOf.description: List of search strings. Requires an equals without preceding backslash.
